Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the "TaHoma By Somfy" skill for Alexa, you can interact with the devices connected to your TaHoma or Connexoon by voice.
To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Somfy account and say: "Alexa, discover my devices". 
Find more information about connecting smart home devices and scenes at https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=G3RKPNRKF33ECTW7.

Window coverings (rolling shutters, exterior and interior blinds and screens):
- You can open/close your equipment, for example: "Alexa, open the bedroom blind" or "Alexa, close the kitchen shutter".
- You can set their position, for example: "Alexa, set the living room shutter to 50%".
- You can adjust their position, for example: "Alexa, raise my bedroom blind by 10%".

Garage doors and gates*:
- You can open/close your device, for instance: "Alexa, open the garage door" or "Alexa, close the gate"
*You must configure a PIN code in the Alexa app to control your devices.

Lights and plugs:
- You can turn On/Off your lights or plugs, for example: “Alexa, turn off the kitchen light”, or “Alexa, turn on my bedroom plug”. 
- You can dim/change the brightness of the lights, for example: “Alexa, dim the bedroom light”, or "Alexa, brighten the living room light to 60%".
- You can change the color if you have such lights, for example: "Alexa, set the kitchen light to pink".

Groups:
To control several equipment in the same room, simply tell Alexa to open or close <group name>.
- "Alexa, turn on the bedroom", for the bedroom lights (group name: bedroom).
- "Alexa, open the living room" for the living room shutters (group name: living room)
Groups can be created in the Alexa App. Create one and add your device(s) to it to enjoy group control. More information is available at https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=GS8URL9U6PW8SPTA.

Scenes (for TaHoma only):
Additionally, you can launch scenes mixing different equipment (TaHoma scenarios).
Simply ask Alexa to turn on <scene name>.
- "Alexa, turn on Good Morning."
- "Alexa, turn on Everything Up."
Scene names can be found in the TaHoma app. Feel free to create new scenes or to rename existing ones to perfect your experience with Amazon Alexa.
Note that Alexa does not allow scenes giving access to your home (garage doors, alarm systems, doorlocks,…). Such scenes will not be discovered by Alexa, even if they contain other devices.
However, in order to use your Somfy One, Somfy Home Alarm and Security Camera, you can activate the Somfy Protect skill.
If you have any questions, please visit the Somfy Support at https://www.somfysystems.com/en-us/support.
